name: Coin Pusher (itch) (Najbjerg Media Games)
description:
This is my very first game in unity, it is a simple coin pusher game to make the time go by. The first couple of seconds when the game starts it is locked to make the coins spawn in.

It is still under development (and there is much still to do), but i will be taking a break from it for now to focus on a new game i am making :) Right now it is playable, and i enjoy it myself. Hope you like it :D

I would love to hear your thoughts on this project. I hope you like it :D

Game by: Kennet Najbjerg

Music and SFX by: Andreas Birkmose
